articles.title: ETtech In-depth: Silicon Valley Bank meltdown puts Indian SaaS firms on alert - The Economic Times
articles.description: As the bank's stock lost over 60% of its value on Thursday, venture capital funds checked in with homegrown startups, especially those headquartered in the US, about how much of their capital is held at SVB Financial Group.
articles.content: The crisis at Silicon Valley Bank (SVB) in the US has rattled some Indian investors and founders running SaaS companies with accounts at the lender. As the bank's stock lost over 60% of its value on … [+8393 chars]
